thumb.name: Miss Your Smiley Face
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E(blank)%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI miss your smiley face. John!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Wish We Could Have a Visit
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Wish We Lived Closer. Raquel%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat I wouldn't give today%3Cbr%3ETo step inside your door%3Cbr%3EAnd sit with you and visit%3Cbr%3EAs we've often done before...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBut since that isn't possible.%3Cbr%3EThis note%3Cbr%3Ewill have to do%3Cbr%3ETo say %26#147;Hello' and let you know%3Cbr%3EHow much I think of you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Really Miss You%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Always in My Thoughts
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMissing You. Maria%3Cbr%3ENo matter how far apart we are...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMy thoughts%3Cbr%3Ealways find their way%3Cbr%3Eback to you.

thumb.name: Missing You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJack -- Missing You. My Friend. I think of you so much. I want to see you and talk with you. I wonder what you're doing and if everything's okay. But whenever I start feeling sad because I miss you%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI remind myself how lucky I am to have someone so special to miss. I think about what a good friend you are and how wonderful it will be when we're together again.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA friend loves at all times.%3Cbr%3EProverbs 17:17
